attributes.action: take a firmer stance against the bullys in iran (15 captured soldiers)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prime minister is making a laughing stock of our country....

when will our government take a stand against iranian bullying.. we have one of the best special forces on the planet and 15 loyal soldiers (captured in iran) in need of their help.

does the government intend on proving to the world that they can do as they wish with the uk without fear of reprisals? 

does our government sincerely think that  we will get any help in this situation from a slow moving cumbersome UN other than a card saying they are sorry our country men perished in iran?? 

admittedly diplomacy is often the best option..... 
but surely we can NOT let iran do as they please with our country !!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
